title: Items
content:
# Items 



### Flex : Grow
###### Items grow as N times when expanded

> - flex-grow

```sass
/* Item Grows 2 times as much as other items */
flex-grow: 2;
```

### Flex : Shrink
###### Items Shrink as N times when collapsed

> - flex-shrink

```sass
/* Item shrinks 2 times as much as other items */
flex-shrink: 2;
```



### Flex : Basis
###### Allows us to specify the width of an item before it stretches or shrinks.
> - flex-basis

```sass
/* Set initial size of 300px before it collapses/shrinks */
flex-basis: 300px;
```

# Flex Grow vs Flex Basis

The items are all the same and their content is all the same, flex grow 1 will fit them equally within the main container if they have the same content, but if they have variable size content flex basis should be used and declared to 100%
